meanings.definition: The spread of lymphoma throughout the body.
meanings.sent1: Lymphomatosis can affect many parts of the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying ways to treat lymphomatosis effectively.
meanings.sent3: When lymphomatosis strikes, it's like an unwelcome guest overstaying its welcome.
meanings.sent4: The rapid lymphomatosis invasion was akin to an unstoppable army advancing.
meanings.sent5: The image of lymphomatosis spreading like wildfire is alarming.

meanings.definition: A condition characterized by the presence of lymphoma cells in various organs.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with lymphomatosis after finding lymphoma cells in different organs.
meanings.sent2: Lymphomatosis can lead to complications in multiple organs.
meanings.sent3: The lymphomatosis cells seemed to be having a party in the organs.
meanings.sent4: Her body felt like a battleground with lymphomatosis troops scattered everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The presence of lymphomatosis cells in various organs was concerning.

meanings.definition: The process of lymphoma cells invading different tissues.
meanings.sent1: The progression of lymphomatosis involves the invasion of tissues by lymphoma cells.
meanings.sent2: Lymphomatosis can be aggressive in its tissue invasion.
meanings.sent3: The lymphomatosis cells were like tiny explorers venturing into new territories.
meanings.sent4: The relentless lymphomatosis invasion reminded him of a slow but steady march.
meanings.sent5: The image of lymphomatosis cells invading tissues is vivid.
